INVJ.BA.summary: Inversora Juramento S.A., an agricultural-livestock company, engages in the production, industrialization, and commercialization of beef and agricultural production in the northwestern region of Argentina. It produces and supplies meat; and agricultural products, such as soy, sorgo, alfalfa, and corn. The company has approximately 90,000 hectares of land located in the province of Salta. It also exports its products primarily to Chile and the European Union. Inversora Juramento S.A. was founded in 1990 and is based in Salta, Argentina.

LEDE.BA.summary: Ledesma Sociedad AnÃ³nima AgrÃ­cola Industrial produces and sells agro-industrial products in Argentina. The company offers sugar, paper and copybooks, alcohol and bioethanol, fruits and citric juices, corn-based products, and meat and grains; cereals, corn syrup, and starch; and school spares. It also produces energy from renewable sources. The company is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

MOLA.BA.summary: Molinos Agro S.A. produces and sells soybean meal and oil, and corn in Argentina and internationally. It also provides animal feeds, including pet, poultry, pork, and dairy food products; and constructs and operates a biodiesel plant. In addition, the company exports hipro soy meal, soy hull pellets, crude soy oil, soy lecithin, biodiesel, refined glycerin, and corn wheat. Molinos Agro S.A. is based in Victoria, Argentina.

MORI.BA.summary: Morixe Hermanos S.A.C.I. manufactures and sells wheat flour in Argentina. It offers its products for the preparation of mini crackers, extra virgin olive oils, green olives, Balsamic Vinegar, white corn meal, oats, breadcrumbs, frozen french fries, pastas, corn flour, and mashed potatoes. The company was formerly known as Francisco Morixe e Hijos Sociedad Colectiva and changed its name to Morixe Hermanos S.A.C.I. in 1914. Morixe Hermanos S.A.C.I. was founded in 1901 and is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

SAMI.BA.long_name: S.A. San Miguel A.G.I.C.I. y F.
SAMI.BA.summary: S.A. San Miguel A.G.I.C.I. y F. produces and distributes fresh and processed citrus products in Argentina, South Africa, and Uruguay. The company offers fresh fruits, such as grapefruits, organges, lemons, mandarins, avocado, and grapes; and processed foods, including juices and pulps, oils and essences, and peel products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1954 and is headquartered in Vicente Lopez, Argentina.

SEMI.BA.summary: Molinos Juan Semino S.A. produces and exports grains and byproducts in Argentina. The company offers flours, gluten, native and modified starches, dextrins, proteins, and pre mixes, as well as byproducts, such as algocol A, acetilated cotton, algocol C, starch A plus, starch A, starch AB, acetilated starch, low humidity starch, starch hydrociclone, starch injection, rusted starch, pregelatinized starch, sanitized starch, dextrines, gluten alvol and protogel, flour 0000 fresh pasta, flour 0000, flour 000 baker, flour mas pan sandwich, flour plus bread, and pandulcera meal. Its products are used in the food, refrigeration, textile, paper, oil, and other industries. The company exports its products to various countries, including Brazil, Chile, Bolivia, Uruguay, Paraguay, Ecuador, Peru, the United States, Japan, China, Malaysia, Taiwan, Thailand, Hong Kong, Saudi Arabia, Turkey, Russia, and others. Molinos Juan Semino S.A. was founded in 1865 and is based in CarcaraÃ±Ã¡, Argentina.
